title: Leading airlines worldwide - based on total number of passengers 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of passengers in millions for 10 number of Airliness.
Airlines American has the highest Number of passengers in millions and Air China has the lowest Number of passengers in millions.
Airlines American has 1.85 times more Number of passengers in millions than Airlines Air China which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Airlines, and Number of passengers in millions in each Airlines on the y axis.
The Number of passengers in millions is highest at Airlines American and lowest at Airlines Air China.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of passengers in millions for 10 number of Airliness.
Airlines American has the highest Number of passengers in millions and Air China has the lowest Number of passengers in millions.
Airlines American has 1.85 times more Number of passengers in millions than Airlines Air China which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airlines in the x axis and Number of passengers in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of passengers in millions 203.7 is found at Airlines American and the minimum is found at Air China where Airlines is 110.0.
Airlines Air China has 1.85 times less Number of passengers in millions than Airlines American which is the highest.
Number of passengers in millions at Airlines American is 203.7 , second place is Delta at 192.5, and thirdly is Southwest at 163.6.
The Airlines American tends to be 1.37 percent higher than average.
The Number of passengers in millions is 1488.0 if we add up values of all Airliness.
